Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of the peptide shows 37% similarity toreptile VK10orfish Parasin I. PI 9.31; GRAVY -1.04; Mol Wt 2778.098; mol formula C115H194N39O39S1.Structure: Predicted to be helical.Activity: Active against C. albicans ATCC 10231 (MIC 21.6 uM), C. krusei DSM 70079 (MIC 20.7 uM), C. glabrata ATCC 90030 (MIC 19.8 uM), A. niger ATCC 9029 (MIC 22.5 uM), A. flavus PFCC 100 (MIC 23.4 uM), and A. fumigatus Af 293 (MIC 20.7 uM). Provided by Hadi Zare-Zardini. Updated 10/2023
Literature Information.Author: Khani S, Seyedjavadi SS, Zare-Zardini H, Hosseini HM, Goudarzi M, Khatami S, Amani J, Imani Fooladi AA, Razzaghi-Abyaneh M.2019
Literature Information.Title: Isolation and functional characterization of an antifungal hydrophilic peptide, Skh-AMP1, derived from Satureja khuzistanica leaves
